data.title: Intuit QuickBooks Certification Certified User
data.text:
Click on image to expand.

Event Details

A Intuit QuickBooks Certified User program will build a foundation of basic accounting knowledge and utilities of the Intuit QuickBooks software that

includes pre-built sample companies, multiple company files, annual updates, and data backed-up and restored.

Successful completion of this course will increase your knowledge and ability to:

1. Professional Accountancy

2. Producing and managing invoices

3. Creating purchase orders

4. Tracking sales and expenses

5. Monitoring financial records

Admissions and Additional Details

Payment will be taken at the time of Registration.

Registration Hours: Mon- Thurs 8AM- 5PM, Fri 8AM- 4PM. Payments accepted via phone, or walk in. Visa, Mastercard, and Discover cards accepted.

Refund Cancellation Policy:

A 100% refund will be granted if a request is made les made 2 business days prior to the start of class. A 50% refund will be issued if notice is received less than 2 business days prior to class. No refunds will be issued after the first day of class.

Attachment(s)

Intuit QuickBooks Certified User January Flyer
